items.text: full inswinger at leg stump. Big appeal as Jadeja falls over and cops this on the pad while looking to flick. But it's going well down
items.postText: Kedar Jadhav and KL Rahul are...standing and talking. That's strange, because Mashrafe is ready at the top of his mark. There's also a massive conference in the team balcony. Are they thinking of perhaps not risking Jadhav's injury further?
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jadeja, no run

items.text: beaten. Length ball wide outside off, climbs up as he looks to run this down to third man. It's taken by Mushfiqur and there's a bit of a conference about a possible review, but they won't take it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jadhav, no run

items.text: slower ball at a length just outside off. Dabs it to point off the front foot
items.postText: Rohit signals to Jadhav that they want him to stay there and not get flustered by the dot balls.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jadhav, no run

items.text: slower short ball just outside off, mistimed chop to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jadhav, no run

items.text: short ball outside off, shuffles and looks to pull behind square. Struck on the back leg and deflected to Mushfiqur
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jadhav, no run

items.text: short of a length at off stump, gets across and taps it behind square
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jadhav, 1 run

items.text: gets it past the keeper and it's well away from fine leg. Mashrafe goes around the wicket and feeds Jadeja on the pads and he gratefully nudges it fine.
items.postText:
Souvik: "What about a runner? What's the rule?" --- Runners are no longer allowed. Jadhav can come back to bat later on.

India are feeling some pressure, it is visible in the dressing room. And it looks like they've taken the decision to call Jadhav back in. Bhuvneshwar walks in as Pandey escorts Jadhav off. The equation got a little too tight for a non-running batsman to be in the middle.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jadeja, 4 leg byes

items.preText: A wide slip in place for Bhuvneshwar
items.text: beaten. Not convincing first up from Kumar. Swishes at a length ball that is angling viciously across him
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Kumar, no run

items.text: length ball pushing across him again and this time he watches it go
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Kumar, no run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, tapped into the covers off the back foot with soft hands
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Kumar, no run

items.text: full on off stump, driven to extra cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Kumar, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, gets behind the line and dabs it in front of mid-on
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Kumar, 1 run

items.text: full ball on leg stump, flicked to mid-on off the front foot
items.postText: Shubhanshu Pal: "Could've taken the decision long back before frustrating MSD into throwing his wicket away " --- Dhoni played four balls after the injury.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jadeja, 1 run

items.text: short and wide outside off, under-edged cut into the covers
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jadeja, no run

items.text: inside edge ad Mushfiqur lunges to his right to parry it away from the path to the helmet and in between fine leg and third man. It's a length ball that doesn't climb as he looks to cut
items.postText: Satvik Jani: "Great decision by the captain to bring back Kedar for now. Quick singles have started to come back."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jadeja, 2 runs

items.text: length on middle stump, punched back to the bowler on the up
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jadeja, no run

items.text: slower ball at a length on off stump. Jabs it wide of extra cover with soft hands and Bhuvneshwar calls early for the run
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jadeja, 1 run

items.text: slower ball in the channel, Bhuvneshwar opens the face on it but this slides past the outside edge
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Kumar, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, goes deep in the crease and punches to mid-on
items.postText: 51 off 60. The only thing completely in India's favour right now is the asking rate. A tense ten overs coming. Sreshth will see you through them.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Kumar, no run

items.preText: Thanks, Varun. It's been a gripping 45 minutes, and now we're down to the final ten overs of the Asia Cup. What an excellent tournament this has been. Mehidy from around the wicket to Jadeja.
items.text: good length just outside off. Straightens after pitching, and Jadeja taps this away to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Jadeja, no run

items.text: full on of, and he pushes at this with soft hands. The ball dribbles away towards extra cover, and the batsmen manage to pinch a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Jadeja, 1 run

items.preText: Ali: "Can Jadhav "come in" if someone gets out now? Or he has to wait until the last wicket ?" -- he can come back.
items.text: full just outside off stump. Spinning into Bhuvi, and he drives straight to mid on. No chance of a run
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kumar, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off stump, and Bhuvneshwar tries to drive this away from his body. He misses, and so does the keeper. They scamper across for a run
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kumar, 1 bye

items.text: full on leg stump, and clipped off his toes to square leg. They jog across for another
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Jadeja, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, and he paddles this fine! Gently played, and it allows them to come back for the third. Rubel did well to cut this off though. Every run counts
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kumar, 3 runs
